scripts.typecheck: npm run --workspace backend typecheck && npm run --workspace frontend typecheck
scripts.lint: npm run --workspace backend lint && npm run --workspace frontend lint
scripts.validate:backend: npm run --workspace backend typecheck && npm run --workspace backend lint && npm run --workspace backend build
scripts.validate:frontend: npm run --workspace frontend typecheck && npm run --workspace frontend lint && npm run --workspace frontend build
scripts.build:all: npm run ci && npm run validate:backend && npm run validate:frontend
scripts.test: npm --prefix backend run test && npm --prefix frontend run test
